meanings.sent1: She felt tensionless after a relaxing massage.
meanings.sent2: The hammock provided a tensionless place to unwind.
meanings.sent3: The tensionless cat lazily stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His tensionless smile put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent5: The tensionless atmosphere in the room was palpable.

meanings.sent1: The tensionless fabric draped effortlessly over the chair.
meanings.sent2: The tensionless balloon floated gently in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The tensionless rubber band refused to snap.
meanings.sent4: Her tensionless grip on the steering wheel made her a confident driver.
meanings.sent5: The tensionless silence in the room was comforting.
